reviewText: Thinking Allowed is a long-running independent public television series and an extensive video library developed from the series. Hosted by Jeffrey Mishlove, Ph. D., Thinking Allowed aims to provide an open, non-adversarial forum for the exchange of intelligent, alternative ideas. New programs are no longer being produced. The series was presented by Thinking Allowed Productions, produced by Jeffrey Mishlove and Arthur Bloch and directed by Arthur Bloch.
